bibl.title: I.C. CUNNINGHAM and A.D. KNOX, Theophrastus Characters, Herodas Mimes, Cercidas and the Choliambic Poets. (The Loeb Classical Library. 225.)
bibl.note: First published 1929. Second Edition 1993, with new text and translation of Theophrastus and Herodas.
bibl.seg: RUSTEN Jeffrey, I.C. CUNNINGHAM and A.D. KNOX (Edited and Translated by), Theophrastus Characters, Herodas Mimes, Cercidas and the Choliambic Poets. (The Loeb Classical Library. 225.)
Cambridge, Mass. - London, Harvard University Press, 1993, 8°, ix-574 pp. ISBN 0-674-99244-X. £10.50.
364 Carmina varia Graeca Cercidas Herondas Hipponax Theophrastus
